## MarkerTechniqueParams.useIsoCode property

> Warning: This API is now obsolete.
> 
> Use proper expression with \[`get`<!-- -->, `iso_code`<!-- -->\] for this purpose.
> 

If `true`<!-- -->, the iso code (field 'iso\_code') of the elements is used as text. The `iso_code` field contains the ISO 3166-1 2-letter country code.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
useIsoCode?: boolean;
```
